page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION OF AREA
page.content:
Mainly residential.Industry following the Tame Valley-ICI etc.Large areas of park land used for sports/recreation or flower shows etc.
The residential area to the north is predominantly between wars;the houses for the main part being built by The First National Housing Trust in the 1930's.Other large estates are post-war .There is some modern development-this is mainly confined to small pockets of land ,street junctions,land once used for waste tipping in connection with coal mining and on former sand quarries. Industry which follows the Tame Valley is confined mainly to warehousing which includes an inland port.The major} exception being the IMI works.
